title: Super comfy. Great for backpain!
comment: It ease up and relieve my backpain a lot. Definitely worth the price.

title: Comfy! Like sleeping on the clouds
comment: Fuuh you will not believe it but it really is the best bed product you will ever have. Buy it right now!

title: Lack durability
comment: At the start it feels okay but it only take one month for me to hearing the annoying cracking sound whenever I sat on top of it.

title: The fabric washed away so fast
comment: The fabric has great color and soft texture. But the color washed away after got contact with a spilled drink.

title: WHERE IS MY PRODUCT?!
comment: I never received it. Damn scammer
